response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This unique item is not just a product; it's an experience designed to elevate your daily routine. Given its exceptional quality and craftsmanship, I believe it's worth more than $100 to you. For this extraordinary piece, I am offering it to you for $125.
